meanings.sent1: She always prebinds her notebooks before the school year starts.
meanings.sent2: The company prebinds the documents for efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel prebinds its acorns for winter, so it doesn't have to rush later.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to prebinding his work prebinds success to him.
meanings.sent5: Prebinding your goals early prebinds a smoother path to achieving them.

meanings.sent3: The prebinds gift was a pleasant surprise for her birthday.
meanings.sent4: His prebinds schedule allowed him to relax and enjoy his vacation.
meanings.sent5: The prebinds contract ensured a hassle-free transaction.
